mapper.select: SELECT a.CAT1,a.PRODNAME,a.PRICE,FINALPRICE,a.CONDITION,a.REF,CODE,a.ID,a.TERM,a.DESCRIP FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, SALES.* FROM SALES WHERE CONFIRM = 0)a JOIN (SELECT MAX(finalPrice) AS FINALPRICE, CODE FROM AUCTION GROUP BY CODE) USING(CODE) WHERE RN>=#{page}*10-9 AND RN<=#{page}*10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM SALES WHERE CONFIRM = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM SALES WHERE CAT1=#{cat1} AND CONFIRM = 0

SELECT a.CAT1,a.PRODNAME,a.PRICE,FINALPRICE,a.CONDITION,a.REF,CODE,a.ID,a.TERM,a.DESCRIP FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, SALES.* FROM SALES WHERE CAT1=#{cat1})a JOIN (SELECT MAX(finalPrice) AS FINALPRICE, CODE FROM AUCTION GROUP BY CODE) USING(CODE) WHERE RN<=10
SELECT * FROM SALES WHERE PRODNAME LIKE #{word} OR REF LIKE #{word} OR DESCRIP LIKE #{word}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SALES WHERE PRODNAME LIKE #{word} OR REF LIKE #{word} OR DESCRIP LIKE #{word}
